alert.note: Alert for Barry; Stone (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 04 at 5:58PM CDT until April 04 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Stone County in southwestern Missouri... Eastern Barry County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 558 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Beaver, or 7 miles north of Eureka Springs, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Table Rock Lake, Roaring River State Park, Shell Knob, Galena, Mccord Bend, Golden, Emerald Beach, Eagle Rock, Chain-O-Lakes, Arrow Point, Cape Fair, Wheelerville, Jenkins, Madry and Elsey. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
